yaml.description: Data science, machine learning, and deploying applications with Docker and Shiny to deliver data-driven solutions.

markdown.markdown:
```{=html}

Nion M. Dransfeld

Civil Engineer | Data Scientist | Machine Learning Engineer

I am a data specialist with experience in deploying applications using Docker, Streamlit and Shiny.This site presents my projects and also offers educational content on geosciences, statistics, data science, programming, and machine learning.

``` --- The following projects highlight my expertise in data science, machine learning, and application deployment. I am open to new projects, collaborations, and professional opportunities where I can deliver innovative and impactful solutions. ::::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} ::: {.card .h-100}
[Talkmapper.com](http://Talkmapper.com)

An audio processing service that leverages advanced algorithms for automated transcription and speaker diarization (identifying who spoke when).

::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} ::: {.card .h-100}
[Congeres.com.br](http://Congeres.com.br)

A platform for analyzing general conditions of insurance policies in Brazil, designed for brokers to optimize risk assessment and client consultation.

::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} ::: {.card .h-100}
[Nioeng.com](http://Nioeng.com)

A data platform dedicated to the analysis, visualization, and tracking of the Brazilian public budget, promoting transparency and accessibility.

::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} ::: {.card .h-100}
[Cryptosresearch.com](http://Cryptosresearch.com)

A research and analytics platform providing institutional-grade reports, on-chain data analysis, and market insights for crypto assets.

::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} ::: {.card .h-100}
[Ancestrymap.nionmaron.com](http://Ancestrymap.nionmaron.com)

An offline-first desktop application for building, visualizing, and managing complex family genealogy trees with privacy as a core feature.

::: ::: ::::: --- ## Latest Content ::: {#latest-content} ::: ## What You'll Find Here ::::: grid ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} ### In-Depth Analyses Explore detailed articles and case studies where I apply machine learning and statistics to solve real-world problems. ::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} ### Code Solutions & Guides Find practical, step-by-step tutorials and reusable scripts to help you implement complex data science techniques. ::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} ### R & Python Package News Stay updated with commentary and reviews on the latest machine learning packages and tools in the R and Python ecosystems. ::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} ::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"} ### Project Deep Dives Go behind the scenes of my projects to understand the methodology, architecture, and challenges involved. ::: ::: ::::: ## Insights > "Data science is not about making complicated models. It's about making it simple enough to understand the problem at hand and then robustly solving it." > > – Dr. N.R. Srinivasa Raghavan > "Overfitting is more dangerous than failing to build the most powerful model possible." > > – Pedro Domingos ---
